messages.content: was egypt a part of the ottoman empire
Yes, Egypt was a part of the Ottoman Empire, although it often enjoyed semi-autonomous governance.
is in n out only located in california
No, In-N-Out also operates in other states like Texas, Arizona, and Nevada.
are all the angles equal in a parallelogram
Nope! In a parallelogram, opposite angles are equal, but not all angles.
is st augustine the oldest city in florida
Yes! It's the oldest continuously inhabited European-established city in the U.S.
is hawaii 5-0 still on tv
Hawaii Five-0 isn't airing new episodes anymore; it ended in 2020.
is a peck the same as a bushel
No, a peck is one-fourth of a bushel.
do they still have drive in movies in america
Yes, drive-in movies are still around in America!
can you use vegetable oil as carrier oil
Absolutely! Vegetable oil can be used as a carrier oil in various applications.
is a father in law considered a relative
Absolutely! A father-in-law is indeed a relative, connected through marriage.
is israel part of the european economic area
No, Israel is not part of the European Economic Area.
